name: Mind the mind
description:
Mind the Mind is a short, uneventful horror game. You are going through a routine night-time job. Everything is quiet and boring, but what was that noise?

Maybe someone broke in? Maybe the place is haunted all along? Maybe some rowdy kids were throwing rocks and they smashed a window?

But, without fail, there's nothing there. Maybe that's enough to get you scared. Hopefully not.

Really hope not...
